mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM employment ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) WHERE rownum<=1

SELECT eno,name,title,personal_history,salary_str,loc,emp_type,regdate,deadline,hit,fo_count,se_count,num FROM (SELECT eno,name,title,personal_history,salary_str,loc,emp_type,regdate,deadline,hit,fo_count,se_count,rownum as num FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_ASC(employment employment_list_seq)*/eno,name,title,personal_history,salary_str,loc,emp_type,regdate,deadline,hit,fo_count,se_count FROM employment)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT eno,name,title,personal_history,loc,emp_type,hit, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbregdate, TO_CHAR(deadline,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbdeadline, fo_count,se_count,dtype,rtype,num FROM (SELECT eno,name,title,personal_history,loc,emp_type,hit,regdate,deadline,fo_count,se_count,dtype,rtype,rownum as num FROM (SELECT eno,e.name,title,personal_history,loc,emp_type,hit,regdate,deadline,e.fo_count,se_count, TRUNC(deadline,'DD')-TRUNC(SYSDATE,'DD') as dtype, TRUNC(SYSDATE,'DD')-TRUNC(regdate,'DD') as rtype FROM employment e,company c WHERE e.cid=c.cid AND cno=#{cno} AND deadline>SYSDATE
AND personal_history LIKE '%'||'신입'||'%'
AND personal_history LIKE '%'||'경력'||'%'
ORDER BY deadline ASC
ORDER BY regdate DESC
ORDER BY hit DESC
)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employment e,company c WHERE e.cid=c.cid AND cno=#{cno} AND deadline>SYSDATE
AND personal_history LIKE '%'||'신입'||'%'
AND personal_history LIKE '%'||'경력'||'%'
